title: card.usage.test Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Calculates a projection of how long the available data quota will last based on the observed usage patterns.

days.description: Number of days to use for the test.

hours.description: If you want to analyze a period shorter than one day, the number of hours to use for the test.

megabytes.description: The Notecard lifetime data quota (in megabytes) to use for the test.

samples.title: Test 7-Day Usage Projection
samples.description: Calculate data quota projection based on the last 7 days with 500MB quota.

samples.title: Test 12-Hour Usage Projection
samples.description: Calculate data quota projection based on the last 12 hours.

samples.title: Default Quota Test
samples.description: Test with default 1024MB quota using 30 days of data.
